user_instruction: 'Send Sarah an update on Project Falcon (sarah@apexmarketing.com). You can check out my Gmail and Notion for information.'

formatted_items.arguments:
{"to":["sarah@apexmarketing.com"],"subject":"Project Falcon – Update and Next Steps","body":"Hi Sarah,

Hope you're well.

Quick update on Project Falcon:
• Implementation phase (Phase 2) is moving smoothly; creative assets are finalized and the initial test groups are responding positively.
• The media plan is nearly complete—just awaiting final review from the buying team, with sign-off expected early next week.
• Your proposed social-media adjustments look great; I’d like to review them together to confirm KPIs and rollout sequencing.

Next steps
1. Align on the final media plan and overall launch timeline.
2. Discuss the social-media tweaks and integrate any last feedback.
3. Confirm team responsibilities for the upcoming review phase.

Could we set up a brief call early next week (Tuesday or Wednesday morning) to cover these items? Let me know what works best for you, or feel free to suggest an alternative.

Thanks for your continued leadership on this project—I appreciate the team’s hard work and the progress we’ve made.

Best,
John"}
